text: U Don't Know Me (Like U Used To) – The Remix EP is the first EP by American R&B; singer Brandy Norwood, released in 1999. It was released for promotional use only. ==Release== During 1999, her record company, Atlantic Records, released a 9-track remix EP entitled U Don't Know Me... Like U Used To – The Remix EP. The album contains remix versions with Da Brat, Ma$e, Fat Joe, Big Pun, Darkchild, DJ Premier and many other artists and producers. The album is seen as a maxi-single so the peak positions are the same as the peak positions of the single. The songs on U Don't Know Me did not have much success with a peak position of #79 on the U.S. Hot 100, 50 in Canada and 25 in the UK. The album's lead single was "U Don't Know Me (Like U Used To) [Remix]". ==References== Category:1999 albums Category:Brandy Norwood albums
title: U Don't Know Me (Like U Used To)
